item.title: ABOUT US
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row pt_vc_dummy_textfield="vc_row" pt_vc_full_width="No" tablet_layout="tablet-layout" pt_vc_parallax="No" pt_hidden_viewport="hidden-phone"][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][pt_text]

We're in the business of hosting great ideas

[/pt_text][pt_text]

Since Media Temple began in 1998, we’ve been on a mission to help web developers, designers, digital entrepreneurs, and innovators bring their ideas to life online.

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="460" measure="px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pt_vc_dummy_textfield="vc_row" pt_vc_full_width="No" tablet_layout="tablet-layout" pt_vc_parallax="No" pt_hidden_viewport="hidden-tablet,hidden-desktop"][vc_column width="1/1"][pt_text]

We're in the business of hosting great ideas

[/pt_text][pt_text]

Since Media Temple began in 1998, we’ve been on a mission to help web developers, designers, digital entrepreneurs, and innovators bring their ideas to life online.

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="150" measure="px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: PRICING & PLANS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][pt_text color="#87929c"]

East Start. No credit card required

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="50" measure="px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][pt_pricing_tab currency="$" description="1 theme included 1 year of theme updates 20% off future purchases" title="FREE" price="0" sub_title="Ideal for beginners" button_title="GET STARTED" button_action="#" text_color="#3b3b3b" button_color="#323a45" button_text_color="#ffffff" border_line_color="#87929c" add_button="1"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][pt_pricing_tab currency="$" description="12 themes included 1 year of theme updates Access all new themes" add_button="1" title="ENTERPRISE" price="250" sub_title="Per user / month" button_title="GET STARTED" button_action="#" text_color="#3b3b3b" button_color="#323a45" button_text_color="#ffffff" featured="1" featured_color="#323a45" featuredtext_color="#ffffff" border_line_color="#323a45"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][pt_pricing_tab currency="€" description="24 themes included Lifetime of premium support Access all new themes" add_button="1" title="PREMIUM" price="250" sub_title="Per user / month" button_title="GET STARTED" button_action="#" text_color="#3b3b3b" button_color="#323a45" button_text_color="#ffffff" border_line_color="#87929c"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][pt_marginblock margin="50" measure="px"][pt_text color="#323a45"]

Choose an option which suits your needs, and more importantly, your budget. 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. No questions asked.

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="130" measure="px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][pt_rules_horizontal pt_separator="separator5" width="100" margin_bottom="-2" color="#4a5157" align="text-center"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: HAPPY CLIENTS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row pt_vc_dummy_textfield="vc_row" pt_vc_full_width="No" tablet_layout="tablet-layout"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][pt_text color="#4a5157"]

Over 6,271 customers trust us worldwide.

[/pt_text][pt_text color="#87929c"]

We take pride in our interdisciplinary approach in crafting beautiful, functional and engaging work that delights and delivers results.

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="60" measure="px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][pt_testimonials_balloon name="Elisha Cuthbert" image="1967" quote="Built with equal amounts of imagination & precision. Clean, intelligent designs that function as expected. Nice." text_color="#4a5157" border_line_color="#e5ecf3" background_color="#ffffff" circle="1" minheight="170"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pt_testimonials_balloon name="Ben Hughes" image="1967" quote="When one of my friends is looking for their first website I direct them to Pixelthrone. Nothing short of excitement." text_color="#4a5157" border_line_color="#e5ecf3" background_color="#ffffff" circle="1" minheight="170"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pt_testimonials_balloon name="Christian Madsen" image="1967" quote="Pixelthrone is setting the bar pretty high with regards to both design and usability. " text_color="#4a5157" border_line_color="#e5ecf3" background_color="#ffffff" circle="1" minheight="170"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][pt_testimonials_balloon name="Jonathan Sadowski" image="1967" quote="What impressed me was the fast response to questions from the devs and helpful community conversation." text_color="#4a5157" border_line_color="#e5ecf3" background_color="#ffffff" circle="1" minheight="170"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/1"][pt_marginblock margin="130" measure="px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Open Project Without Ajax
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row pt_vc_dummy_textfield="vc_row" pt_vc_parallax="No" pt_vc_bg_color="#d1cabc" pt_vc_full_width="No"][vc_column width="1/1"][pt_single_image img_size="full" image_align="text-center" links_target="_self" image="1946"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row pt_vc_dummy_textfield="vc_row" pt_vc_full_width="No"][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/6"][pt_marginblock margin="50" measure="px"][pt_text css_animation="flipInX" css_delay="0.5"]

About This Project

[/pt_text][pt_text css_animation="flipInX" css_delay="0.8"]

The tableau all waned at last with the pallidness aloft; and once more the Pequod and every soul on her decks were wrapped in a pall. A moment or two passed, when Starbuck, going forward. “What thinkest thou now, man; I heard thy cry; it was not the same in the song.”

[/pt_text][pt_marginblock margin="100" measure="px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
